I started looking at this today. It looks like it is possible to 
override access security in the latest JVMs -- look at JUnitX. I 
would like to fine a tool that can generate a wrapper class 
automatically and expose all methods as public. Has anyone seen such 
a beast?

Thanks 

David

-- In junit@y..., "Miles, Eric SAXONHQ" <milese@s...> wrote:
> Can you use a separate test class and access the private methods of 
the
> tested class through reflection?
> 
>
